name: flash-fire

effect.sword-shield: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.the-isle-of-armor: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.the-crown-tundra: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.brilliant-diamond-and-shining-pearl: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.legends-arceus: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

short_effect: Protects against fire moves. Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.sword-shield: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
